channel.title: Save your character to a .java file?
channel.description: when my characters save, it saves as a .DAT file so i can't edit them... how can i make it to save as a .java file or what ever so that i can change the things? if i can't, is there a way to save a .java file along with the .DAT so it would be like...right underneath it?

item.title: Save your character to a .java file?
item.dc:creator: @ILOVEJAVA ILOVEJAVA
item.description:
@ILOVEJAVA wrote:

when i edit it on the notepad, it does not save…

Read full topic

item.title: Save your character to a .java file?

when my characters save, it saves as a .DAT file so i can’t edit them… how can i make it to save as a .java file or what ever so that i can change the things? if i can’t, is there a way to save a .java file along with the .DAT so it would be like…right underneath it?

Your using proj. annihilation? I suggest keeping it as a .dat
